name: Meteor Escape
description:
Meteor Escape is a single-player hyper-casual endless runner where you play as a rocket-ship trying to escape incoming meteor showers.  Meteor Escape will challenge your reflexes quite intensively!  How far can you get and what's your high score?

CONTROLS

Left Arrow Key to move left.
Right Arrow Key to move right.

FEEDBACK WELCOME

As we are still in the initial stages of developing Meteor Escape, we're going to need all the feedback we can get!  Please let us know if you find any bugs / things that annoy you when testing our little game!

AUDIO CREDIT

Game Theme by TheFlakesMaster 
Button Click by dland
Game Over by cabled_mess
